channel.title: Smart like dimantle mod?
channel.description:
Is there a mod for mass dismantling that works like SMART does? or does SMART have a mass deconstruct function I'm not seeing?
Essentially what I'm looking for is a way to deconstruct an entire building without accidentally deconstructing anything else
